title: Point-of-care diagnostics for SARS-CoV-2 wastewater-based epidemiology: a big leap toward miniaturization
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00384E, Critical Review
Ahmed Donia, Nonsikelelo Precios Mthethwa-Hlongwa, Isaac Dennis Amoah, Sheena Kumari, Faizal Bux
Integrating point-of-care diagnostics into SARS-CoV-2 wastewater surveillance enables rapid detection and response. This innovation enhances pandemic management and has potential for broader public health applications beyond COVID-19.
